items.summary: Bring galactic battles into your classroom with SPIKE Essential. Students build and battle starfighters, deciding outcomes by chance. Perfect for ages 6-9, it provides engaging lessons in robotics and coding.
Explore the potential of combining SPIKE Prime with 3D printing for enhanced robotics classes. Unlock creative freedom with custom components, though logistical challenges like printer access remain.
Relive classic gaming by building Snake and Arkanoid with SPIKE Prime in Python. Engaging kids in hands-on coding, they explore game mechanics, fostering creativity and critical thinking.
Discover mechanical principles with the Flying Bird project. Using SPIKE Prime, mBot 2, and a laser cutter, students construct a moving owl model, enhancing design and engineering skills.
The Carousel project demonstrates centrifugal force through hands-on construction. Using SPIKE Prime and mBot 2 with a laser cutter, students engage in scientific exploration and skill development.
Introduce your classes to cranes, carousels, and more with 8 new robotics projects. Using laser cutters and LEGO sets, these lesson plans bring unique educational adventures.
Use the Carousel model to teach centrifugal force with SPIKE Prime and mBot 2. Precision manufacturing with a laser cutter ensures students observe physics in action through engaging lessons.
Transform pixels into creations with SPIKE Prime and Python. Students build Snake and Arkanoid games, understanding programming and game mechanics while fostering creativity and curiosity.
Learn wind measurement with a LEGO anemometer using SPIKE Prime and a 3D-printed propeller. Ideal for integrating STEM learning with real-world data collection and engineering skills.
Explore new projects like cranes and carousels using SPIKE Prime and mBot 2. With laser cutters and detailed lesson plans, bring unique educational experiences into your classroom.
Build a moving owl with the Flying Bird project using SPIKE Prime and mBot 2. Students grasp crank mechanism principles and enjoy practical engineering with laser-cut components.
Introduce unpredictable fun to coding with Cosmic Battle. Students aged 6-9 build starfighters using SPIKE Essential, learning robotics through exciting classroom challenges.
